name: Data Entry India
description:
We at Data Entry India are a global data outsourcing and data Management Company with over 20+ years of experience and clientele across 51 countries. Our experience and expertise in converting large quantities of paper and image-based forms to electronic data used for databases and document management systems is what sets us apart from our competitors. 
BPOServices:                                                                  
Data Processing: Documents, Invoice, Forms – Insurance, Survey, etc.
Data Entry Services: Online & Offline
Data Conversion: Document, Catalog, Book, File Format – XML, HTML, PDF to Word
Document Imaging & Management
All back-office support solutions
Our flexibility and scalability required for project management, helps us invent and integrate latest technologies and services to help businesses, corporations, institutions and people manage their business data and make profitable growth. 
For more information, email us on info@dataentryindia.com
